org.apache.giraph.utils

类 UnsafeByteArrayOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • org.apache.giraph.utils.UnsafeByteArrayOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, AutoCloseable, ExtendedDataOutput

    public class UnsafeByteArrayOutputStream
extends OutputStream
implements ExtendedDataOutput
    Byte array output stream that uses Unsafe methods to serialize/deserialize much faster

        参数:
        buf - Buffer to start with, or if null, create own buffer

        public UnsafeByteArrayOutputStream(byte[] buf,
                           int pos)
        Constructor to take in a buffer with a given position into that buffer
        参数:
        buf - Buffer to start with
        pos - Position to write at the buffer

        public byte[] getByteArray()
        从接口复制的说明: ExtendedDataOutput

      • writeInt

        public void writeInt(int pos,
            int value)
        从接口复制的说明: ExtendedDataOutput
        In order to write a size as a first part of an data output, it is useful to be able to write an int at an arbitrary location in the stream
        指定者:
        writeInt 在接口中 ExtendedDataOutput
        参数:
        pos - Byte position in the output stream
        value - Value to write
